email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Following up on our call earlier, I’m pleased to offer a freight rate of $50.75 per ton for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel we’re proposing is the MV Ocean Star, a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. Laycan is set for October 15-20. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Thanks for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Would you consider $49.50 per ton? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s availability for the laycan period?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Thanks for your response. I understand your concern, but $49.50 is below our current market position. However, I can offer a revised rate of $50.25 per ton. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for the laycan period of October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Thanks for the revised offer. I can agree to $50.25 per ton, provided the demurrage rate is capped at $20,000 per day. Can you confirm this? Also, please send over the full vessel details and laytime terms.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Great, I’m glad we’re aligned on the freight rate. I can confirm the demurrage rate at $20,000 per day. Attached are the full vessel details and laytime terms. Let me know if you need anything else to finalize the fixture.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $50.25 per ton and the agreed demurrage terms. Please send over the contract for review and signature.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Perfect! I’ll prepare the contract and send it over shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment.

Best regards,
Sarah
